meanings.definition: A message or greeting accompanied by candy.
meanings.sent1: I received a sweet candygram from my friend on my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She sent a candygram to thank her teacher for all the help.
meanings.sent3: The candygram was a delightful surprise at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm candygram on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The candygram made the celebration even more special.

meanings.definition: A type of candy that is often sent as a gift.
meanings.sent1: The store had a variety of candygrams for sale.
meanings.sent2: He bought a box of candygrams to give out on Halloween.
meanings.sent3: The candygram was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The candygram melted in her mouth like a sweet memory.
meanings.sent5: The colorful candygram looked too pretty to eat.
